mapper.select: select * from msg where msg_receiver = #{value} and msg_sender!='administrator' and receiver_del=0 order by msg_date desc
select * from msg where msg_receiver =#{value} and msg_sender='administrator' and receiver_del=0 order by msg_date desc
select * from msg where msg_sender = #{value} and sender_del = 0 order by msg_date desc
select count(*) from msg where msg_receiver = #{value} and msg_view=0
mapper.update: update msg set msg_view=1 where msg_seq=#{value}
update msg set sender_del=1 where msg_seq=#{value}
update msg set receiver_del=1 where msg_seq=#{value}
